mapper.select: SELECT Boardnumber,Boardtitle,boardcontent,BoardTime,boardview,m.usernumber,nickname FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY boardnumber DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) b inner join member m on m.usernumber = b.usernumber
mapper.update: update board set BoardTitle = #{BoardTitle}, boardcontent = #{BoardContent} where BoardNumber= #{BoardNumber}
mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM RN, A.* from (select commentnumber,boardnumber,usernumber,nickname, commentcontent,commentdate,nvl(parentcommentnumber,commentnumber) as parentcommentnumber, targetnickname from commenttable order by parentcommentnumber asc,commentnumber asc) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: update commenttable set CommentContent = #{commentcontent} where commentnumber = #{commentnumber}
